last_episode_to_air.overview:
The story of Aghazadeh's film

The series "Aghazadeh" (Aghazadeh), directed by "Behrang Tofighi", is written and produced by "Hamed Angha" in the genre of social romantic drama, which has many similarities to Hamed Angha's previous works such as "Icy Heart". The actors of "Aghazadeh" are Amin Tarakh, Amir Aghaei, Mehdi Soltani, Soraya Ghasemi, Laia Zanganeh, Sina Mehrad, Diba Zahedi, Mehdi Koushki, Samieh Lak, Massoud Foroutan, Kaveh Khodashenas, Saeed Dakh, Roozbeh Moeini and Amin Hayaee with the presence of Kambiz. Niki Karimi, an artist, has long played a different role than Jamshid Hashempour and Mohammad Hossein Latifi. This drama series will have challenging adventures and will deal with various social and economic issues along with a love story.

name: Agha Zadeh
